message: Starting week11.json explanation rewriting task. Reading source files.
Read all sources. Week11.json has 43 questions. Starting systematic rewrite of all explanations using ADHD-friendly guidelines.
Completed rewriting all 43 question explanations. Now verifying file and reporting findings.

COMPLETED: Rewrote all 43 week11.json explanations to be ADHD-friendly. All explanations now include: (1) Concrete mechanism details (dopamine D2 receptor blocking, SERT transporter blocking, GABA enhancement) (2) Step-by-step processes for each therapy type (3) No metaphors - all literal language (4) Clinical examples from catalog (A Clockwork Orange for aversion therapy) (5) Bold key terms and short paragraphs. File saved: week11_rewritten_explanations.json
